Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say only one heart piece in all of Hyrule will declare the holder a winner.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that ##the Lost Woods## has #5# major items.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #a Piece of the Triforce#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path of #gold#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that spinning #Goron pottery# contains #Deku Nut Capacity#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that between the #crawl spaces in the Spirit Temple# chests contain...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Early Torches Chest

KF (Outside Storms).text: Did you know that ReDead won't attack if you walk very slowly?
